data.name: New York Style Dough
data.desc: Thin crust - all-purpose or bread flour, sugar, salt, instant yeast, olive oil, and water.

data.name: Neapolitan Style Dough
data.desc: Grilled dough - bread flour, salt, instant yeast, and water.

data.name: Sicilian Style Dough
data.desc: Square pizza - all-purpose or bread flour, salt, instant yeast, olive oil, and water.

data.name: Gluten Free Dough
data.desc: Gluten free bread flour, sugar, fine salt, gluten free baking powder, xanthan gum and olive oil.
